title: Coronavirus Whistleblower, Bagelrito? Bagelrito! 3.2.20
itunes:title: Coronavirus Whistleblower, Bagelrito? Bagelrito! 3.2.20
description:
In episode 580, Jack and Miles are joined by our wonderful writer J.M. McNab to discuss Tom Steyer performing with Juvenile, Trump's coronavirus conspiracy theory, a new whistleblower out of the Human Health Services department, Biden surging in South Carolina, the bagelrito, The Invisible Man, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Watch Tom Steyer Dance to Juvenile’s ‘Back That Azz Up’ Performance at South Carolina Rally
  2. Here’s Trump at his rally tonight in South Carolina dismissing worries about the coronavirus as the “new hoax”
  3. Whistleblower Claims Retaliation After Alleging Reckless Coronavirus Response
  4. Election Update: Biden Surges In South Carolina
  5. The Bagelrito is a literal hot mess, but it has a confidence you can only dream of
  6. With The Invisible Man, Horror Is Starting to Get #MeToo Right
  7. ‘Invisible Man’ Male Director Asked Elisabeth Moss to Correct His Script, Ensure Female POV
  8. Can Universal Create a Marvel-Like Universe With 'The Mummy' and Other Monster Flicks?
  9. WATCH: Hiatus Kaiyote - The Lung

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
